Trade/Device Name(s): RPMI 1640 Agar w/ MOPS and 2% Glucose
Regulation Name(s): Culture medium for antimicrobial susceptibility test
Methodologies: Gradient method for antifungal susceptibility testing
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Remel RPMI 1640 Agar w/ MOPS and 2% Glucose used in gradient-based antifungal susceptibility testing of Candida spp.
Indications for Use Summary: Recommended for use with antibiotic gradient-based systems for quantitative determination of susceptibility to antifungal agents when testing Candida spp. directly from colonies grown on nonselective media.
